attributes.action: Leave the EU on the 29th March 2019
attributes.additional_details: Theresa May stated many times that she would not extend article 50 in parliament and in many speeches outside parliament. She has been forced by the remain parliament to give an extension when the public were told that we would leave on the 29th of March!
attributes.background: Leave the eu on the 29th of March WITHOUT an extension to article 50 with or without a deal. An extension would mean trust in politicians would be broken between the people.
